revision.comment: addition of OS and bootloader info
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WAC120 |revision=(130BN HMW) |series=AC1200 |asin=B00O4UJHCO |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |availability=End of Support Life |fcc_date=06/19/2014 |fcc_id=PY313400246 |ic_id=4054A-13400246 |pcb_id=2976467601 |type=access point |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9344 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=NAND |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |ram2=128 |ram2_brand=Micron |ram2_model=MT29F1G08ABAEAWP |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9344 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9882 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;dni29 V0.3; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31;WAC120_V2.1.7 |default_ip=192.168.0.100 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }} {{TagLine|ProSafe 802.11ac Wireless Access Point}} :[https://www.netgear.co.uk/business/products/wireless/soho-wireless/wac120.aspx Product page] (UK)
"2976467601" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. *{{WiFiCert|WFA52948|05/30/2014}} Based on this device's specs, it may be using AR9344 and QCA9882.
